entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
